calculations.name: Overall Rating
calculations.tableau_expression:
IF [Priority Segment] = "Top Priority" THEN 
    [Order Health Score] + 1
ELSE
    [Order Health Score]
END

calculation_context.Expression:
IF [Priority Segment] = "Top Priority" THEN 
    [Order Health Score] + 1
ELSE
    [Order Health Score]
END

calculated_fields.Priority Segment:
IF [Profit Health] = "Excellent" AND [Profitablity Tier] = "High Margin"
THEN "Top Priority"
ELSE "Normal"
END
calculated_fields.Order Health Score: IF  [Failure Risk]="High Risk" THEN [Final Score]-2 ELSE [Final Score] END
calculated_fields.Failure Risk: IF [Loss Flag]=1 AND  [Discount Tier]="High Discount " THEN "High Risk" ELSE "Low Risk" END
calculated_fields.Profitablity Tier: IF  [Profit Margin %]>20 THEN "High Margin" ELSEIF [Profit Margin %]>10 THEN "Medium Margin" ELSE "Low Margin" END
calculated_fields.Profit Health:
IF [Profit Ratio ] > 0.2 THEN
    IF [Revenue Tier] = "High" THEN "Excellent"
    ELSE "Good" END
ELSE
    IF [Revenue Tier] = "Low" THEN "Poor"
    ELSE "Average"
END END
calculated_fields.Final Score: IF  [Discount Tier]="Low Discont" THEN [Performance Code]+ 1 ELSE [Performance Code] END
calculated_fields.Revenue Tier: IF [Net Revenue ]>1000 THEN "High Margin" ELSEIF [Profit Margin %]>10 THEN "Medium Margin" ELSE "Low Margin" END
calculated_fields.Discount Tier: IF [Discount Health]>0.25 THEN "High Discount" ELSEIF  [Discount Health]>0.10 THEN "Medium Discount" ELSE "Low Discont" END
calculated_fields.Performance Code: IF [Is High Performing ]="Yes" THEN [Quality Score ]+2 ELSE [Quality Score ]-1 END
